author: Josh Chin
title: An Anbang-Linked Revolutionary Heir Dies in China. Speculation Begins.
text:
BEIJING—The sudden death of a revolutionary scion linked to troubled Chinese insurer Anbang Insurance Group Co. is reverberating through China’s battered private business community. 
Chen Xiaolu, 71, was one of a generation of well-connected so-called “princelings”—children of Communist Party elders—who amassed large fortunes after China opened up its economy in the late 1970s. 

Mr....
